overview: Julia, aged 18, kills her sister by pushing her from the 12th floor; and at the discotheque, she hits her classmate's head with a beer bottle. Julia is arrested and sent to the Girls Rehabilitation Centre where she is tortured and savaged by the guards.
tagline: Action! Betrayal! Hatred! Bloodshed! Girls! Girls! Girls! Beware of the Nightmare
title: Strike of the Tortured Angels
